nodes.bodyText: Why not use a Parquet schema visitor?
I was thinking it needs another schema conversion. Anyway, I just updated this by parquet type visitor. Look like a bit simple.
Why is name needed? The MessageType has a name that can be used instead of passing it in separately.
It would be better to pass in MessageType instead of Schema. That way removing IDs and converting to Parquet are not mixed together.
Oops, I need coffee in the morning before coding..
